original_text: And Peter followed him afar off, even into the palace of the high priest: and he sat with the servants, and warmed himself at the fire.
korean_text: 베드로가 예수를 멀찍이 따라 대제사장의 집 뜰 안까지 들어가서 아랫사람들과 함께 앉아 불을 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: even into the palace of the high priest
and he sat with the servants
and warmed himself at the fire
